channel.title: ux on Technical Ramblings
channel.description: Recent content in ux on Technical Ramblings

item.title: Quora : I hate you for this
item.description: I have been using quora for almost two years. I have connected my Facebook, twitter, wordpress, tumblr accounts. Unless you are logged into quora you cannot read the post, on the surface this is true. If you are web geek you know you can look into the source code and read the page content and by pass. The Problem Now I am logged into facebook in tab 1, tab 2 is loading quora url, after few seconds dialog box appears and I am automatically logged into quora account.
